Tristan Mills wrote:
>
> On Fri, Nov 21, 2008 at 18:05, Jeff <jjg@... 
> <mailto:jjg%40jqhome.net>> wrote:
> > I have made jUnit 4 test suites and run them with maven from the command
> > line. Is there a readme on how to do this as part of the regular build?
> > Why doesn't maven run test suites automatically?
>
> Surefire is the Maven2 plugin for running tests:
>
> http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-surefire-plugin/ 
> <http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-surefire-plugin/>
>
> To be run as a test by default the class should be named
> SomethingTest. Since I prefer to name my suits SomethingSuite I set
> the includes myself to include **/*Suite
>

>
> HTH
> Tristan
>
